feed.title: [patch] Switching Bitcoin Core to sqlite db

entry.title: [patch] Switching Bitcoin Core to sqlite db
entry.summary: In an email thread on bitcoin-dev mailing list, Douglas Roark shared a link to a Wikipedia page discussing the bugs and reliability of LevelDB, a Google open source product. Although he acknowledged that the link is not very rigorous, it served as a starting point for the discussion. The email thread did not delve further into the topic, but one participant expressed their intention to avoid using LevelDB based on the information provided in the link.
